name: LightSouls Presents: Save the Bitcoin from DS-G Demo
name_original: LightSouls Presents: Save the Bitcoin from DS-G Demo
description:
LightSouls PRESENTS:  "DS-G Demo"

This dude stole a ton of bitcoin from innocent investors, and its your job to get it all back.   This is a timed event.  Person with the fastest time to defeat DS-G and have the biggest amount of bitcoin in their bag at the end wins a prize.  What is the prize?  I donno.

PLAY THE FREE "Dan Stonkman-Gried Demo" NOW AND RELEASE ALL THE STOLEN BITCOIN

Discord: https://discord.gg/DHnyUaZesT 

Twitter: https://twitter.com/LightSoulsGame 

Official Website: https://lightsouls.io/
